import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import { Button, Row, Col ,ListGroup,Image,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import Message from '../components/Message' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) =>state.cart) // calculate prices cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc,item) => acc + item.price * item.qty,0) cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 100 cart.taxPrice = Number() // calculate prices const placeOrderHandler = ()=>{console.log('order')} return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country},

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your Cart is Empty :( {cart.cartItems.map((item,index)=>( {item.name} {item.qty} x {item.price} = ${parseInt(item.qty * item.price)} ))} ) }

Order Summery

Items ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
